d_0_1.line: I've never seen you in these woods before, what are you doing here?

d_0_2.line: Oh... Well I don't really care about that and I'm evil so I'm just gonna majorly inconvenience you!

d_0_3.line: Hyah! Now you'll never make your journey!

choices.line: I'm just trying to get to the other side of the island...
